abstract.text: The main class for interacting with the Last.fm API.
Get the top tracks of a user on Last.fm.
Get the metadata for an artist on Last.fm using the artist name or a MusicBrainz ID.
Scrobbles multiple tracks to a user’s Last.fm profile.
Get the top global tags on Last.fm, sorted by popularity.
Gets the tags applied by an individual user to an album on Last.fm.
Get the loved tracks of a user on Last.fm.
Marks a track as loved for the authenticated user.
The session key for authenticated requests. This is set after a successful login.
Scrobbles multiple tracks to a user’s Last.fm profile using a completion handler.
Gets the top tags for the last week.
Retrieves the top tags for a given track.
Get the top albums of a user on Last.fm.
Checks whether the supplied artist has a correction to a canonical artist
Creates a new instance of the SBKManager.
Get the top artists of a user on Last.fm.
The main class for interacting with the Last.fm API.
Retrieves the corrected artist and track names for a given track name and artist name.
Gets a list of the top tracks on Last.fm ordered by popularity.
Get the top tracks tagged by this tag, ordered by tag count.
Search for tracks matching the given query.
Get the top tags of a user on Last.fm.
Get the metadata for a tag.
Retrieves the metadata for a track on Last.fm.
Retrieves a list of tracks similar to the given track and artist.
Get friends of a user on Last.fm.
Retrieves the error for a specific track in the given response, if any.
Unlove a track on Last.fm.
Get a list of available charts for this tag, expressed as date ranges which can be sent to the chart services.
Retrieves the tags applied by an individual user to an artist on Last.fm.
Checks if a specific track was successfully scrobbled in the given response.
Notifies Last.fm that a user has started listening to a track.
Get personal tags for artists from a user on Last.fm.
Tag an album using a list of user-supplied tags.
Remove a user’s tag from an album on Last.fm API.
Gets a list of similar artists for the given artist.
Get the top artists tagged by this tag, ordered by tag count.
Adds tags to an artist.
Get personal tags for tracks from a user on Last.fm.
Retrieves the top artists for a specific geographic location.
Search for tags similar to this one. Returns tags ranked by similarity, based on listening data.
Remove a user’s tag from a track on Last.fm API.
Get personal tags for albums from a user on Last.fm.
Tag a track using a list of user-supplied tags.
Searches for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance.
Get the top albums tagged by this tag, ordered by tag count.
Retrieves a list of tags associated with a given track.
Retrieves information about a Last.fm user.
Fetches the top tags for an album on Last.fm, ordered by popularity.
Get the recent tracks of a user on Last.fm.
Get the metadata and tracklist for an album on Last.fm using the album name or a MusicBrainz ID.
Remove a user’s tag from an album on Last.fm.
Searches for artists similar to the given query.
Fetches the top artists chart from Last.fm.
Returns a list of all the artists in a user’s library.
Gets the top tracks by an artist.
Streamlined interaction with Last.fm on Apple platforms
